origin.origins.human.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§oNone§r

 A human's fate is more open than most - venture forth with no benefits or drawbacks.
origin.medievalorigins.alfiq.name: Alfiq
origin.medievalorigins.alfiq.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Unarmed Bonus§r
§o§2+ Unique Movement§r
§o§6• Carnivore§r
§o§c- Defense§r
§lAlfiq§r are a cunning species of anthropomorphic felines with sharp claws and excellent agility. Their roads often lead to warm sands.
origin.medievalorigins.arachnae.name: Arachnae
origin.medievalorigins.arachnae.descript:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Poison, Crowd Control
+ Wall Climbing§r
§o§6• Carnivore§r
§o§c- Hunger, Armor§r
A grotesque amalgamation of spider and human, with venomous fangs and bristled feet yet the ability to walk upright and wield weaponry.
origin.medievalorigins.banshee.name: Banshee
origin.medievalorigins.banshee.descripti:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Flight, Support, Phasing§r
§o§c- Defense§r
§o§c- Extreme changes, read first!§r
§lBanshees§r are anguished spirits whose cries can shatter glass and drive people to madness. In myth, their presence is often considered an omen of death.
origin.medievalorigins.incubus.name: Incubus
origin.medievalorigins.incubus.descripti:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Nether Bonuses
§o§6• Fire-based
§o§c- Damaged by Water§r
§o§c- Weak in Overworld§r
§lIncubi§r are evil servants of a dark power. They are powerful in their own realm, but in exchange for this they have given up their soul, and are weak to pure sources.
origin.medievalorigins.dwarf.name: Dwarf
origin.medievalorigins.dwarf.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Mining, Caving§r
§o§6• Short: 102cm/3'7"§r
§o§c- Sun sensitive 
- Can't swim§r
§lDwarves§r are practical, stocky, and prideful. They excel at mining and living underground, but struggle with the daylight. Rock and stone, brother.
origin.medievalorigins.wood_elf.name: Wood Elf
origin.medievalorigins.wood_elf.descript:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Ranged Bonuses, Speed§r
§o§6• Stealthy, Vegetarian§r
§o§c- Melee Damage, Defense§r
§lWood Elves§r are a wise, long-lived race who live in harmony with the Earth. They are quick with a sword and bow and can outwit their enemies while among the trees.
origin.medievalorigins.high_elf.name: High Elf
origin.medievalorigins.high_elf.descript:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Magic, Unique Abilities§r
§o§c- Physical Damage
- Defense§r
§lHigh Elves§r are notoriously arrogant, though undeniably talented; elemental magics course strongly through their blood, though they are weaker with weaponry.
origin.medievalorigins.fae.name: Fae
origin.medievalorigins.fae.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Hovering, Magic§r
§o§6• Short: 122cm/4'0"§r
§o§c- Loved by Mobs§r
§o§c- Defense§r
§lFae§r are short magical winged humanoids, regarded as spirits of nature and said to haunt forests and lead travelers' astray. They are equal parts mystic and trickster.
origin.medievalorigins.goblin.name: Goblin
origin.medievalorigins.goblin.descriptio:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Gold Gear Bonuses§r
§o§2+ Luck, Speed§r 
§o§6• Small: 92cm/3'3"§r 
§o§c- Health, Defense§r
§lGoblins§r are obsessed with gold and treasure and tend to find a little more loot wherever they look, but their small size leaves them vulnerable in combat.
origin.medievalorigins.gorgon.name: Gorgon
origin.medievalorigins.gorgon.descriptio:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Poison Damage, Immunity§r
§o§2+ Crowd Control§r
§o§c- Hydrophobe 
- Unique weaknesses§r
§lGorgons§r are cursed creatures who were once human, with hair made of writhing snakes and a haunting visage said to petrify those who witness it.
origin.medievalorigins.moon_elf.name: Moon Elf
origin.medievalorigins.moon_elf.descript:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Dagger Damage
+ Dextrous§r
§o§6• Stealthy, Doesn't Sleep§r
§o§c- Defense§r
Mysterious, ethereal beings not of this world. Moon elves are named not for their homeland, but for the only thing their victims can see before their end.
origin.medievalorigins.ogre.name: Ogre
origin.medievalorigins.ogre.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Axe Bonuses, Defense §r
§o§6• Massive: 268cm/9'5"§r
§o§c- Hunger, Speed §r
§lOgres§r are a large, short-tempered, and brutish subspecies of Orc. Their lumbering size and limited intelligence are made up for by their raw strength.
origin.medievalorigins.pixie.name: Pixie
origin.medievalorigins.pixie.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Unique Flight, Odd§r
§o§6• Tiny: 22cm/9" §r
§o§c- Defense, Reputation §r
Often considered harbingers of good fortune, but also tricky, untrustworthy agents of mischief. Pixies are whimsical and very, very small.
origin.medievalorigins.plague_victim.des:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Withering §r
§o§6• Unique playstyle §r
§o§6• Undead §r
§o§c- Defense, Reputation 
§o§c- Difficult§r
Disease-ridden half-dead creatures who can no longer be called human, cursed and trapped in eternal suffering as a result of a strange magical illness.
origin.medievalorigins.revenant.name: Revenant
origin.medievalorigins.revenant.descript:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Summons §r
§o§2+ Illager Friendly 
§o§6• Undead, Complex §r
§o§c- Reputation
- Living interactions §r
§lRevenants§r are misfortunate souls who died gruesome and painful deaths, but inexplicably returned to life. As a result, they become obsessed with manipulating life and death in other creatures.
origin.medievalorigins.siren.name: Siren
origin.medievalorigins.siren.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Water-Based, Utility §r
§o§6• Weaker on Land§r
§o§c- Vulnerable to Fire§r
§lSirens§r are said to be a type of Merfolk. They have an ensnaring aura and their irresistible beauty is said to be the downfall of many a foolish sailor.
origin.medievalorigins.troll.name: Troll
origin.medievalorigins.troll.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§cNOT CURRENTLY IMPLEMENTED§r
Large, lumbering giants who hail from the mountains, trolls are aggressive and self sufficient - they prefer to live and fight alone.
origin.medievalorigins.yeti.name: Yeti
origin.medievalorigins.yeti.description:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Frost-Based, Tanky§r
§o§6• Large: 203cm/6'8"§r
§o§c- Heat Sensitive§r
Thick-furred beasts from frosty woods, a Yeti's dominion over ice allows them to freeze foes, but they are especially vulnerable to fiery attacks.
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/clawed.name: Clawed
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/clawed.descr: Alfiq have razor sharp retractable claws; they deal extra damage with empty paws, and can climb up and cling to steep surfaces (Can be toggled)
Near sunset and sunrise, Alfiq will move and attack much more quickly. At other times, they are lethargic and slightly slower.
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/on_your_feet: If you ever fall from a height where you would take 5 hearts or more of damage, they instead take no damage at all.
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/pickpocket.d: Right click the back of a villager while crouching with empty paws for a chance to steal some emeralds. Or get caught. Rumor has it you may be able to steal from other players.
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/pounce.name: Pounce
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/pounce.descr: After briefly crouching without moving to charge up, an Alfiq can leap forward a great distance. Striking an enemy during the pounce deals bonus damage.
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/poor_grip.de: Alfiq have reduced breaking speed with tools and reduced damage with handled weapons like swords and axes.
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/agile_prefer: Alfiq prefer to wear only light armors for ease of movement. Heavier armors can be worn without penalty with an enchantment.
power.medievalorigins.alfiq/meow.name: Meow
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/bottomles: Arachnae require a larger quantity of food to stay alive.
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/brittle.d: The Arachnae's chitinous exoskeleton makes it difficult to move if wearing armor heavier than iron. This can be prevented with an enchantment.
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/climber.d: The fine bristles on the Arachnae's legs allow them to climb up walls.
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/fragile_e: The Arachnae's exoskeleton is more vulnerable to damage. They have slightly less health than a regular human.
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/many_eyes: The Arachnae's eight eyes are all adpated to darkness, and allow them to see clearly even with very little light.
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/venomous_: Arachnae's fangs contain venom, and every attack has a chance to inflict poison.
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/web_sling: Arachnae can, on command, spin webs in which their opponents will be immobilised for a short while.
power.medievalorigins.banshee/spectral.d: Banshees possess the ability to become intangible, moving freely throughout the physical realm while being unable to interact with it. This uses tremendous energy and can not be activated while low on hunger.
power.medievalorigins.banshee/hexed.name: Hexed
power.medievalorigins.banshee/hexed.desc: Banshees are shrouded in curses. Every time they are hit, there is a small chance that the attacker will be consigned to a fate of slow, agonising death.
power.medievalorigins.banshee/immaterial: Banshees have half the health a living person would have.
power.medievalorigins.banshee/dimeritium: Magically suppressive metals, such as iron or silver, are completely intolerable to banshees.
power.medievalorigins.banshee/lunar_nexu: Banshees restore no hunger from food - their energy is only restored by direct moonlight, however, they cannot starve.
power.medievalorigins.banshee/sonic_shri: Banshee's shrieks forewarn death. They can unleash an earsplitting wail, pushing back nearby entities and summoning a small protective circle. Targets hit directly by the shriek will be disoriented
power.medievalorigins.banshee/cursed_sig: You deal increased damage when wielding a cursed weapon.
power.medievalorigins.banshee/cursed_war: You resist additional damage for each piece of cursed armor worn.
An incubus' bloodlust is insatiable. If it isn't the flesh of an animal, its worthless.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/demon_fire: Incubi are innately more potent with all fire magics, and can release a burst of flame at will. Scales with Fire Spell Power.
Fire feels like home - it deals no damage to Incubi and satiates them.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/hydrophobe: Water scalds Incubi, damaging them on contact.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/impure.des: Incubi take extra damage from Smite and reverted effects from healing and harming.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/dimension_: Incubi are not accustomed to dimensions where the sun shines and are weaker there, but they are considerably stronger in the Nether.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/unholy_dea: An incubus can exchange some of their life force for raw power for a short time. Triggered with Primary Active key.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/darkness_dwe: Direct sunlight will burn dwarven eyes, blinding them temporarily. Preventable with an enchantment or a gold helmet.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/dense.name: Dense
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/dense.descri: Dwarves are extremely heavy for their size; they sink rapidly in water.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/dwarven_tech: Dwarves are capable of mining stone without a pickaxe, and mine anything faster than others.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/miniature.de: Dwarves are just short enough to fit into a 1 meter tall tunnel (and almost as wide as one).
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/mythril_reso: Powerful metals which carry the spirit of your people fill you with might.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/nocturnal_ey: Dwarves can focus to see clearly without needing any light source.
Dwarves are notorious for their powerful drinks which would knock out someone twice their size. Activate to take a swig and fully restore health.
Humans have no changes from the base game.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/archer.de: Wood Elves spend their whole lives training with bows - their arrows are always more deadly.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/forest_vi: While in tall shrubbery or leaves, wood elves can crouch to gain night vision and become undetectable to nearby mobs.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/eagle_eye: Wood Elves can track an enemy for a short time after damaging them, even when they aren't in view.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/empowered: After charging for a few seconds, release an arrow at increased velocity, piercing enemies, flying further, and dealing more damage.
After charging for a few seconds, release an arrow at increased velocity, piercing enemies, flying further, and dealing more damage.
After charging for a few seconds, release an arrow at increased velocity, piercing enemies, flying further, and dealing more damage.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/elegant.d: Wood Elves have less health and are slowed by wearing heavy armor (This can be prevented with an enchantment).
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/steward.d: Wood elves live off of and in harmony the forest - They can not digest meat.
Wood elves are slightly taller than the average human.
Wood elves are not as powerful, but they are quick. Your attacks deal reduced damage but are slightly faster.
power.medievalorigins.fae/allure.name: Allure
power.medievalorigins.fae/allure.descrip: Fae are naturally alluring. Mobs will pursue them from much further away than they would other creatures.
power.medievalorigins.fae/diminutive.des: Fae are fairly short, most barely being taller than the average goblin.
Iron and silver inhibit fae powers. It is unbearable for them to wear it.
power.medievalorigins.fae/levitation.des: Fae are light, winged creatures who can float effortlessly on the air. Press the primary active key to hover upward.
power.medievalorigins.fae/magic_resistan: As magical creatures themselves, faes take less magic damage compared to other creatures.
power.medievalorigins.fae/regen.name: Regeneration
power.medievalorigins.fae/regen.descript: Fae can channel magical energy and heal themselves quickly, at the cost of hunger.
power.medievalorigins.goblin/cunning.des: Goblins are clever creatures, and know where to find more rare loot most others would miss.
power.medievalorigins.goblin/frail.name: Frail
power.medievalorigins.goblin/frail.descr: Due to their small stature, goblins' have less health and are more prone to damage.
power.medievalorigins.goblin/greedy.name: Greedy
power.medievalorigins.goblin/greedy.desc: Goblins have a special relationship with treasure - they gain extra bonuses when using or wearing golden gear.
Gold in a goblin's hands lasts for much longer than most others who are careless with it.
power.medievalorigins.goblin/nippy.name: Nimble
power.medievalorigins.goblin/nippy.descr: Although short, goblins are quite fast, allowing them to outrun most stronger enemies instead of fighting.
power.medievalorigins.goblin/stunted.des: Goblins are very short, at less than half the height of a human.
Gorgons can not tolerate the purity of water and take damage from it.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/to_stone.de: Gorgons were doomed to stay bound in dark caves and old dungeons. Being outside in daylight causes them to become petrified until night. Can be negated by wearing a helmet.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/silver_aver: Gorgons are weak to the purity of silver - they can not stand to wear it and take damage when wielding it. (Iron is also counted as silver)
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/petrifying_: Meet the eyes of any mob facing you, turning them to stone briefly. Does not work on bosses.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/poison_bloo: Gorgons are immune to poison, and have a chance to spill their toxic blood onto nearby enemies when hit, poisoning them.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/revenge.des: Gorgons deal signifcantly increased damage at low health.
power.medievalorigins.high_elf/elegant.d: High Elves are slowed by wearing heavy armor (This can be prevented with an enchantment), and have less health.
power.medievalorigins.high_elf/ebonbreat: By holding different items, high elves can channel the object's energy to unleash various magics. Hover over each box to see details.
power.medievalorigins.high_elf/fragile.d: A High Elf is not built for hand to hand combat. They are much more susceptible to physical damage, and have less health.
power.medievalorigins.high_elf/mystic_af: High Elves are powerful and clever manipulators of arcane energy - they deal more magic damage and take less magic damage than other races.
power.medievalorigins.high_elf/mana_rpgm: High Elves naturally have more mana than other races, and can channel the power of their elders to regenerate mana quickly.
power.medievalorigins.high_elf/mana_iron: High Elves naturally have more mana than other races, and can channel the power of their elders to regenerate mana quickly.
High Elves naturally have more mana than other races, and can channel the power of their elders to regenerate mana quickly.
power.medievalorigins.high_elf/mana_iron: High Elves naturally have more mana than other races, and can channel the power of their elders to regenerate mana quickly.
High Elves are slender and slightly taller than the average human.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/crazed.de: Try as they might, Moon Elves can not sleep in the overworld.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/stealth.d: In the dark, Moon Elves can turn invisible by sneaking, and move a short distance while stealthed. When attacking from stealth, their first attack deals bonus damage and ends the invisibility. This deals extra damage if wielding a dagger.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/elegant.d: Moon Elves are slowed by wearing heavy armor. This can be prevented with an enchantment.
Moon elves are thin and even slightly translucent, and their skin has a peculiar blue hue.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/fragile.d: Moon Elves have reduced health and take increased physical damage.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/moonlight: Moon Elves are most efficient wielding a light and easy to conceal weapon. They deal more damage with daggers and knives.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/nimble.de: With their quick reflexes, Moon Elves have a small chance to dodge any attack.
Moon Elves are about the same height as their distant relatives of the forest, making them slightly taller than humans.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/gargantuan.de: Ogres are massive, and can't fit through doors or even in many small structures.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/lead_belly.de: Ogres care little for what they eat. Food is food. They do not experience poison or hunger.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/ravenous.name: Ravenous
power.medievalorigins.ogre/ravenous.desc: Ogres are almost never full; they need to eat near constantly to stay satisfied.'
power.medievalorigins.ogre/ravager.name: Ravager
power.medievalorigins.ogre/ravager.descr: Axes feel right in an Ogre's hand; this comfort allows them to swing with much more force.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/bloodlust.des: Ogres are known to unpredictably fly into a blinding rage, where they can stomp through a horde of foes quickly but can barely make out what's happening around them.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/sluggish.name: Sluggish
power.medievalorigins.ogre/sluggish.desc: Ogres are slower than most, to conserve some of their energy despite their massive size.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/stocky.name: Stocky
power.medievalorigins.ogre/stocky.descri: Ogres' thick skin and dense bones make them able to tank many more hits than others.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/curse_of_fli: Pixies cannot wear chestplates more substantial than leather, and can not use other wings to fly differently.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/feather_foot: Pixies are so light, it is impossible for them to take fall damage.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/flight.name: On the Dusts
power.medievalorigins.pixie/flight.descr:
Pixies can fly and propel themselves forward and upward.
Read the boxes next to this power for instructions on how to fly.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/mount.name: Shortcut
power.medievalorigins.pixie/mount.descri: You can sit on top of another player's head by right clicking them with empty hands.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/good_fortune: Although pixies can be troublesome, they are also associated with good luck. When mining, they will occasionally get something valubale from plain stone.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/mischief_mak: Pixies are capable of performing numerous mischievous acts which, if not always dangerous, are certainly loud.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/pixie_proper: Pixies are some of the smallest creatures to roam the land, rarely even reaching the average human's knee.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/soaked.name: Soaked
power.medievalorigins.pixie/soaked.descr: Being as small as they are, water poses signficant threat to pixies. It hampers their movement and impairs their ability to fly.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/troublemaker: Villagers know pixies by the legends of trouble they cause, and will refuse to trade with them.
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/cont: The Plagued are a horrifying sight. Villagers will refuse to trade with them out of fear.
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/foul: A horrifying magic swarms the victim, and slowly consumes the life of any living nearby.
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/inso: Sleep is impossible for the Plagued, due to their unending agony.
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/plag: Though the immense pain never ends, there is only so much tissue that can die. Carriers are immune to poison and wither.
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/eter: Once every 5 minutes, upon death, the Plagued are instead forcefully kept alive to prolong their torment.
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/risk: Every time you strike, there is a chance to spread the infection.
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/sens: The Plagued are covered in welts and lesions upon the skin, tender and painful to touch. Its victims cannot wear armor for the pain it causes.
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/skin: This illness drains the spirit, resulting in reduced health and speed.
power.medievalorigins.siren/amphibious.d: In water, sirens can breathe and interact normally, see perfectly clearly, and they swim with increased speed.
power.medievalorigins.siren/flammable.de: Sirens and fire do not mix. Any contact with flame will result in near-instant death.
power.medievalorigins.siren/holy_water.d: Sirens have much more quickly regenerating bodies, but only while fully submerged.
power.medievalorigins.siren/out_of_your_: While on land, Sirens can only heal or regenerate by using potions.
power.medievalorigins.siren/siren_song.d: Activate to overwhelm enemies in a large area, preventing them from harming you for a short time. Does not work on bosses or players.
power.medievalorigins.siren/seduce.name: Captivating
power.medievalorigins.siren/seduce.descr: Press the secondary active key to gain favor with a villager and receive better trades from them.
power.medievalorigins.troll/apex_predato: Trolls cannot eat regular food - they can only satiate their hunger by slaughtering other creatures.
power.medievalorigins.troll/ham_fisted.d: While the huge fists of the troll pack a mighty punch, they are far too cumbersome to hold a shield.
power.medievalorigins.troll/ironhide.des: Trolls have incredibly thick skin, giving them a natural armor and massively increased health.
power.medievalorigins.troll/lumbering.de: When you're as large as a troll, you have a lot of weight to heft around. Movement is noticably slower than one would expect for their size.
Trolls take after the mountains from which they come from. They are massively tall, twice the size of the average person.
power.medievalorigins.troll/old_blood.de: The old blood which runs through the veins of the trolls is bound to the mountains. They cannot heal themselves outside of their hilly homelands.
power.medievalorigins.troll/out_of_stock: There is no armor made to fit trolls - They are doomed to walk with the coverings nature gave them, and nothing more.
power.medievalorigins.troll/rock_throw.d: A troll can, at will, hurl a large rock into the air, plowing through whatever may cross its path. However, this does come at the cost of 64 precious cobblestone blocks.
power.medievalorigins.troll/thunderous_s: Trolls walk with purpose. Should they persist long enough, they can walk straight through any obstacle which may cross their path.
power.medievalorigins.yeti/flammable.des: Yetis are susceptible to fire damage due to their wintry nature.
Yeti can entomb nearby foes in ice on command. Does not work in the nether or on bosses.
power.medievalorigins.yeti/from_whence_y: In icy biomes, yetis move faster and negate fall damage.
power.medievalorigins.yeti/frosty_breath: The frosty breath of the yeti slows any opponents that get close to them.
power.medievalorigins.yeti/thick_fur.des: In deserts, thick fur becomes a curse - it slows Yetis' movement and reduces health
power.medievalorigins.yeti/titanic.name: Titanic
power.medievalorigins.yeti/titanic.descr: Yetis have far more health than a regular human.
power.medievalorigins.yeti/unstoppable.d: Yetis are immune to the slowness effect.
power.medievalorigins.yeti/winter_body.d: Yetis are marginally taller than a regular human, and significantly wider.
power.medievalorigins.revenant/black_thu: A Revenant can not harvest any crops; they wilt at their deathly touch.
power.medievalorigins.revenant/disturbed: Experimenting in the forbidden warps the mind. Revenants cannot sleep, too scared to dream of what they wish they did not know.
power.medievalorigins.revenant/hellraise: At will, a revenant can raise a circle of inert skeletons, acting as a temporary shield to protect them from danger and damage nearby enemies.
power.medievalorigins.revenant/putrid_co: Through the unsettling act of consuming the flesh or bones of the undead, a revenant can empower their next summon of the same type.
power.medievalorigins.revenant/unwithera: Revenants are immune to wither, and, like undead, they take extra damage from smite, receive inverted effects from harming and healing effects, and are immune to poison and regeneration effects.
power.medievalorigins.revenant/skeleton_:
Revenants can reconstruct creatures of the night modified to do their own bidding. These act as pets, will follow and teleport, and skeletons can be equipped with any weapon. Strength of non-mounts scales with Soul/Blood Spell Power. Summon by activating while holding: 
§lSkeleton:§r 
- Mainhand: 4 bones
§lSkeleton Horse:§r
- Mainhand: 12 bones
- Offhand: 1 saddle 
§lWither Skeleton:§r 
- Mainhand: 12 bones
- Offhand: 1 wither skull
§lZombie:§r 
- Mainhand: 4 flesh
§lZombie Horse:§r 
- Mainhand: 12 flesh
- Offhand: 1 saddle
power.medievalorigins.revenant/poor_repu: Villagers will refuse to trade with revenants and iron golems will attack them on sight. However, they are accepted amongst the ranks of the Pillagers.
power.medievalorigins.revenant/siphon.de: When hit, revenants slowly build up a power which allows them to siphon life from their enemies. This affects all creatures for better or worse, except summoned dead.
power.medievalorigins.revenant/unguarded: Obsessing over the spirit realm leaves revenants more open to attack in the physical realm. Most mobs deal more damage to them.
origin.medievalorigins.valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
origin.medievalorigins.valkyrie.descript:
-§l Notable Changes§r: 
§o§2+ Healing§r 
§o§6• Feathered wings§r 
§o§c- Weak to Undead§r
§lValkyrie§r are fearless winged warriors who decide the fate of those in battle; they were said to have carried the dead to Odin's Valhalla
power.medievalorigins.valkyrie/wings.des: Valkyrie have massive white feathered wings, and can fly freely.
power.medievalorigins.valkyrie/intervent:
Leap upward into the air or dash forward if already flying, gaining fall immunity until you land. 

Upon landing, strike the ground with holy energy, cleansing negative effects from nearby allies and healing them. Heal scales with healing/holy spell power.
power.medievalorigins.valkyrie/divine_sm: Every third attack, smite nearby foes. Damage scales with healing/holy spell power.
power.medievalorigins.valkyrie/corruptio: Nearby undead mobs weaken and slow you, and their attacks deal more damage to you.
power.medievalorigins.valkyrie/vanquishe: Upon slaying an undead mob, trigger §nDivine Smite§r§r§r and slightly reduce the effects of §nCorruption§r for each slain. Lose half stacks on death.
power.medievalorigins.valkyrie/heavenly_: Valkyrie have innately more healing/holy spell power and are more potent with lance or spear-like weapons.
enchantment.medievalorigins.featherweigh: This enchantment can be applied to heavy armor to prevent slowing down Arachnae, Elves, Alfiq, or those with wings.
enchantment.medievalorigins.mirroring.de: With this enchantment applied to helmets, players are immune to a Gorgon's petrifying gaze and Dwarves can see normally in the daylight.
badges.medievalorigins.pixie.jump:
Pixie jumps are 2 blocks high. They can also fly, which uses up §bFlight Power (FP)§r. 

 §bFP§r only regenerates while on the ground.
badges.medievalorigins.pixie.glide:
Glide - Press %s in the air to glide gently using your wings. 

Uses no §bFP§r.
badges.medievalorigins.pixie.hover:
Hover - Quickly press %s twice to begin hovering (a slower creative flight) and slowly drain §bFP§r. 

If your §bFP§r runs out completely, you'll stop hovering.
badges.medievalorigins.pixie.dash_forwar:
Dash - Press %s twice quickly to dash forward. 

This uses 50 §bFP§r if gliding, and 25 §bFP§r otherwise.
badges.medievalorigins.pixie.dash_upward:
Dash Up - Quickly press %s then %s to dash upward. 

This also uses 50 §bFP§r if gliding, and 25 §bFP§r otherwise.
badges.medievalorigins.pixie.disable_eff: Press %s while sneaking to disable sounds and particle effects
badges.medievalorigins.high_elf.glacial_: §bGlacial Step:§r Hold an ice block to manipulate the entropy of water molecules, allowing you to walk as if you had Frost Walker
badges.medievalorigins.high_elf.extrusiv: §4Extrusive Movement:§r Hold obsidian to channel the flow of heat and walk freely on smoldering lava
badges.medievalorigins.high_elf.instant_: §eInstant Cure:§r Right click a villager with a golden apple to directly channel its healing energy without needing to weaken them
badges.medievalorigins.high_elf.void_war: §5Void Warp:§r Press %s while holding an ender pearl to rip through the fabric of reality and teleport yourself directly where you're looking, up to 50 blocks away
badges.medievalorigins.high_elf.blazenbr: §cBlazenbreath:§r Press %s while holding coal in either hand to shoot forth a weak cone of flame. Hold blaze powder instead to shoot forth a moderate cone of flame. Scales with Fire Spell Power.
badges.medievalorigins.high_elf.ebonbrea: §dEbonbreath:§r Press %s while holding bottled dragon's breath in either hand to shoot forth a cone of strong magical flame. Scales with Fire and Arcane/Ender Spell Power.
badges.medievalorigins.revenant.siphon: Hit a living creature to drain its life force. Damage scales with accumulated resource and Soul/Blood Spell Power.
badges.medievalorigins.revenant.eat: Besides bones and rotten flesh, eating certain monster heads can charge this resource more quickly.
medievalorigins.contagious_villager: This villager will not trade with you!
medievalorigins.disturbed_restless: What you know will kill you, but you will die laughing.
medievalorigins.moon_elf_no_sleep: The strange sounds of this foreign world leave you restless.
medievalorigins.insomniac_welts: Your welts sting and burn. There will be no sleep for you tonight.
medievalorigins.poor_reputation_villager: The villager is too scared to trade with you!
medievalorigins.troublemaker: Villagers don't trade with the likes of you!
medievalorigins.uncastable: You can't use this ability right now.
origin.medievalorigins.high_elf/arcanist:
High Elves are innately more talented in one element, decided at birth. 

A mage consumed with mastering the esoteric and the unknown. 

+1 Arcane Spell Power
origin.medievalorigins.high_elf/pyromanc:
A lunatic who derives pleasure from watching things burn. 

+1 Fire Spell Power
origin.medievalorigins.high_elf/cryomanc:
A calm, wise soul who focuses on control and strategy. 

+1 Frost Spell Power
death.attack.siphon.player: % had their soul ripped apart by %s
